name: Garlicky Shrimp Pasta
description: This Mediterranean-inspired pasta is bursting with goodness! Herb & Garlic Dip Mix brings classic flavours, but you can also try this recipe with Ramen Broth Mix for satisfying tamari, smoky flavours and a boost of Vitamin B thanks to your new best friend nutritional yeast. Sweet cherry tomatoes and creamy, salty feta cheese will have you coming back for more!

ingredients.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix or Creamy Garlic Hummus Dip Mix

preparation: In Multipurpose Steamer, combine pasta and hot water. Cover; microwave on high until tender, about 7–8 min. Once cooked, drain and set aside.

Meanwhile, in Wok, heat 1⁄2 tbsp oil over medium-high heat. In a bowl, coat shrimp with dip mix, then add to wok. Stir-fry until slightly pink, about 2 min. Don’t over cook the shrimp—they will continue to cook in the next step.

Reduce heat to medium. Add tomatoes, cooked pasta, and remaining 2 1⁄2 tbsp oil. Stir until shrimp are cooked through and tomatoes start to burst. Add feta cheese. Season with salt and pepper, if desired.
tips: If you have time, place Wok in pre-heated 450° F oven and let the feta melt before serving.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups leafy greens—try arugula!
